alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Santa Clarita Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 25 at 2:17PM PST until November 26 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 45 mph possible. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Ventura County Inland Coast, Central Ventura County Valleys, Calabasas and Agoura Hills and Southeastern Ventura County Valleys. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 3 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Santa Clarita Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Inland Coast
